name: Lichtspeer Complete Bundle
description:
Complete your experience by getting the Lichstspeer Complete Edition Bundle!

Lichtspeer: Double Speer Edition
Grab your Lichtspeer and use it's power to anihilate hordes of enemies in this arcade laserspear-throwing simulator set in german ancient technofuture. Bring a friend along for the ride in co-op mode!

Lichtspeer Soundtrack
The futuristic tunes that helped make the adventure uber-gut are available for your listening pleasure! Feast your ears on the soundtrack by Marcin Sonnenberg. It is said, that even the demanding Lichtgods loved it!

We are alright
Have a peek at what was going on behind the scenes of the production of Lichtspeer. Follow the story of bringing the game to life, witness the last months of production and feel the struggles of indie game development in the documentary made by Borys Nieśpielak.
